snippet.title: Between Horizons - Official Game Overview Trailer
snippet.description: Between Horizons is a narrative 2.5D sci-fi detective adventure. 33 years into the Zephyr's journey, a generation ship, its mission is suddenly jeopardized. It's up to the player to explore the story and get to the bottom of who's responsible. Jasmin Pfeiffer and Julian Colbus of developer DigiTales Interactive walk us through more information regarding their sophomore game Between Horizons coming to PC and consoles in 2023.
